note.p: References: Michael Hunter, 'The Social Bias and Changing Fortunes of an Early Scientific Institution: An Analysis of the Membership of the Royal Society, 1660-1685' in NR 1976-7 vol 31 pp 9-114

Notes: Proposed by Sir William Petty. Never in lists. Hunter supplies year of death. Foster has a John Legassicke, son of John of Hempson Parva, Devon, matriculated 1686 aged 18 (Possibly son of this one)
